articles.title: Minnesota shooting of Venezuelan man is the latest where video evidence contradicts ICE accounts
articles.description:
It is among at least five shootings in which initial descriptions by the immigration officials were later contradicted by video evidence. 

The post Minnesota shooting of Venezuelan man is the latest where video evidence contradicts ICE accounts appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Video evidence contradicts ICE accounts in recent Minnesota shooting of a Venezuelan man.
This incident is one of at least five similar cases involving ICE misstatements.
Boston residents may question ICE's credibility and accountability in local immigration enforcement.
